== Vaikom (M) (803295) ==

Vaikom (M) is a town in the [[Vaikom]] taluka of [[Kottayam]] district with an area of 8.73 sq. km. and harbouring 6068 households with total population of 23234 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kottayam]] is at a distance of 40 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 190 km. Male population is 11304 and female population is 11930. Scheduled Caste population is 1820 and Scheduled Tribes population is 109. Census Location Code of the town is 803295<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Municipality'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Alappuzha (m + og) at a distance of 45 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 63 km. Railway station is at Piravom road at a distance of 20 km.
